Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AliasConfiguration.description: Configuration for an email address alias

EmailAddressArn.description: The identifier of the email address alias
EmailAddressArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the email address alias

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov):connect:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]+-[0-9]{1}:[0-9]{1,20}:instance/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}/email-address/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

AliasConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Configuration for an email address alias

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceArn.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.
InstanceArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 250  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov):connect:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]+-[0-9]{1}:[0-9]{1,20}:instance/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption

EmailAddressArn.description: The identifier of the email address.
EmailAddressArn.markdownDescription:
The identifier of the email address.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws|aws-us-gov):connect:[a-z]{2}-[a-z]+-[0-9]{1}:[0-9]{1,20}:instance/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}/email-address/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Description.description: A description for the email address.
Description.markdownDescription:
A description for the email address.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 250  
Pattern: (^[\S].*[\S]$)|(^[\S]$)  
Update requires: No interruption

EmailAddress.description: Email address to be created for this instance
EmailAddress.markdownDescription:
Email address to be created for this instance

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ([^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+)  
Update requires: Replacement

DisplayName.description: The display name for the email address.
DisplayName.markdownDescription:
The display name for the email address.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: (^[\S].*[\S]$)|(^[\S]$)  
Update requires: No interruption
